description: A teenage girl (appears about 16) who temporarily looks after Marin after she parts ways with Melan for a short period of time. Midori has been arrested several times, so she is instrumental in Marin`s escape from a prison cell. A very mysterious and cool character, she says at one time "Just because somebody makes a few mistakes, suddenly they`re treated like a criminal", possibly referring to either Marin or herself.When marin first meets midori she was being attacked in the park by a momomakia and midori protects her because she forgot melans capsal at home.She very good with a sword and always carries it around with her she used it against the momomakia that tried to kill marin.Melan even ask her to protect her while he fought with pyon.
name: Mano Midori
